name: Vegans
description: A place where vegans can share tips, tricks and recipes!

name: Fruitarian
description: Do you like recipes with tons of fruits? If so, this place is for you!

name: Vegetarian
description: Take your vegetarian dishes and skills to a whole new level!

name: Meat-lovers
description: A dish with no meath is no dish!

name: Pescatarian
description: We, pescatarians are like vegetarians, except we DO eat fish.

name: Paleotarian
description: More commonly known as a Paleo diet, this consists of fresh fruits, vegetables and lean meats only. They do not consume gluten, grains, legumes, dairy, starchy vegetables ( like potatoes ), excessive carbs and processed foods.

name: Ketogenic
description: The Keto lifestyle is essentially known as the ‚Äúlow carb‚Äù diet, which aims to cut back the calories from sugar, soft drinks, pastries and white bread.  The idea is to consume 20-50g of carbs per day, and obtain protein from wholesome products such as seafood, non-starchy vegetables ( like kale & broccoli ), cheese, avocados, lean meats & poultry!

name: Flexitarian
description: A flexitarian diet encourages a plant-based diet, however, it permits you to eat animal products ( like meat, eggs and dairy ) in moderation. It‚Äôs pretty much the ‚Äòflexible‚Äô version of a vegetarian or vegan diet ‚Äì flexible‚Ä¶ flexi‚Ä¶flexitarian‚Ä¶. geddit? üòú  So, if you‚Äôre trying out a plant-based lifestyle, this is an awesome place to start!

name: Beegan
description: ‚ÄòBeegan‚Äô ‚Äì sounds like a Walmart version of vegan hey?  Well, it‚Äôs actually the exact same as veganism, except you are allowed to eat honey! This was allegedly derived from a movement to promote beekeepers (because roughly 33% of food we consume relies on the pollination process!).

name: Raw Foodie
description: Like veganism, the raw food diet is generally plant-based; consisting of fruits, vegetables, nuts and seeds.  Some people also consume raw eggs, dairy, raw fish and sometimes raw meat!
